review: I have ordered several of these - like 6 or 7.  I love them.  They are great for holding picks & make wonderful gifts.
Great product.  I have ordered 6 or 7 or these.
I've never bought strings before so it is kind of hard for me to rate these.  So far so good!
This is perfect for our digital piano.  We love it.  Easy assembly.  I would recommend this to anyone.
This was so perfect that we bought 2 more of them for our music at home!
This works well with the mandolin.  It is certainly an easy change.  I would recommend it &/or purchase again.
